issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Add support for DATE type in SQLite FlightSQL example
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16408](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16408). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Edge case: some SQLite databases have (inappropriately) set column type to `DATE`. The FligthSQL SQLite example fails in such cases.
